name: ElevenLabs Twilio Memory Bridge

When a call arrives, ElevenLabs' native Twilio integration triggers your personalization webhook, which injects caller-specific long-term memory, daily context notes, and a customizable soul/personality template â€” all without proxying audio. Supports OpenClaw (or any OpenAI-compatible) backend as the LLM, Cloudflare Tunnel for secure exposure, and simple file-based persistence with zero external dependencies.
